amr:
# ::snt Mangat bebiquuuu. Abis nangis janji jangan sedih lagi yaa
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :mode expressive
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Mangat"
                  :op2 "Bebiquuuu"))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :mode expressive
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (n2 / nangis))
            :domain (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of h
                  :ARG2 (j / janji)))
      :mod (j2 / jangan
            :mod (s / sedih
                  :mode expressive))
      :mod (p4 / person
            :mode expressive
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Lagi"
                  :op2 "Yaa")))
